articles.author: Vincent Acovino
articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Arceus Will Feature Open World Design - NPR
articles.description: For years, open-world video games, where players can explore the map rather than following a set path, have been hugely popular. The Pokémon franchise is finally catching up, but how will fans react?
articles.content:
Pokémon Legends: Arceus lets players hunt the tiny monsters in a new, open-world setting.
The Pokémon Company
